perturbation.original_text: A consumer who purchases a specially Designated Sponsor Product (as defined below) will receive exactly one (1) unique pin  code (a  "Pin Code")  in-pack. Such a consumer wil l be entitled to visit a custom interactive landing page at the  CharityTunes.com website to enter the unique code and consumer's valid email address to receive downloads up to a  maximum of either three (3), five (5), or seven (7) free MP3 song downloads having a retail value of $1.29 per song or less. Charity Tunes shall make its music catalogue available to the purchasers in MP3 file format to the fullest extent that such  format is available to Charity Tunes pursuant to any agreements in effect between Charity Tunes and its wholesalers on the  date of this Agreement. Accordingly, Charity Tunes shall use its best efforts to update its music catalogue with available MP3  files by June 30, 2009.
perturbation.changed_text: A consumer who purchases a Designated Sponsor Product will receive a Pin Code.  Such a consumer will be entitled to visit a custom interactive landing page at the CharityTunes.com website to enter the code and their email address to receive song downloads. The maximum number of downloads will be determined by Charity Tunes at the time of redemption, based on available inventory and other promotional considerations, but will never exceed ten (10) free MP3 song downloads. Charity Tunes will attempt to make its music catalogue available to the purchasers in MP3 file format. Charity Tunes may update its music catalogue with available MP3 files as it sees fit.
perturbation.explanation: The original text guarantees a specific number of downloads based on the product purchased and a value of $1.29 or less per song. The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating the number of downloads is determined by Charity Tunes at redemption, removing the price constraint, and making the catalog availability a discretionary effort.

perturbation.original_text: Designated Sponsor Products with Pin Codes may be distributed from approximately October 1, 2009 to approximately  December 31, 2009 (the "Promotion Period"). Eligible Pin Codes may be entered on the www.charitytunes.com website and  corresponding music downloaded from October 1, 2009 to March 31, 2010. Pin Codes entered for redemption after 11:59:59  pm PT on March 31, 2010 may be rejected as ineligible. The contents of this section are to be reflected in the Sponsor's rules  for the Promotion.
perturbation.changed_text: Designated Sponsor Products with Pin Codes will be distributed from October 1, 2009, with no guaranteed end date (the "Promotion Period"). Pin Codes may be entered on the www.charitytunes.com website and corresponding music downloaded starting October 1, 2009, but the availability of the website is not guaranteed past December 31, 2009. The Sponsor's rules for the Promotion will state that Charity Tunes reserves the right to discontinue the promotion at any time.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines a specific promotion period with start and end dates for both distribution and redemption. The modified text removes the guaranteed end date for distribution, introduces uncertainty about the website's availability after December 31, 2009, and gives Charity Tunes the right to discontinue the promotion at any time, contradicting the implied fixed term.

perturbation.original_text: Charity Tunes warrants that, subject only to any limitation or condition specified in this Agreement, it will provide  immediately to any consumer entitled to a music download in connection with a Pin Code the music download selected by that consumer.
perturbation.changed_text: Charity Tunes warrants that it will make reasonable efforts to provide a music download to any consumer who attempts to redeem a Pin Code. Charity Tunes does not guarantee the availability of any specific music download and is not responsible for delays due to technical issues or music licensing restrictions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a clear warranty that Charity Tunes will immediately provide the music download. The modified text weakens the warranty by changing 'will provide immediately' to 'will make reasonable efforts,' removing the guarantee of immediate delivery and introducing exceptions for technical and licensing issues, creating a contradiction in the level of assurance offered.
